name: Burkina
desc: One of the six heroes of Natlan who bore the Ancient NameHe died during the Cataclysm 500 years ago at the hands of his companion.

customize.name: Scions of the Canopy
customize.desc: One of the six tribes of Natlan, also known as Huitztlan. The tribe's people love extreme sports like rock climbing, rappelling, and volcano parkour and live alongside the Yumkasaurs.

customize.text: Burkina grew up in the Scions of the Canopy and was friends with

customize.name: Mavuika
customize.desc: The leader of Natlan who inherited the Ancient Name of "Kiongozi." She made a vow to illuminate the future of the nation of war with the Sacred Flame.

customize.name: Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King
customize.desc:
A powerful Yumkasaur that has survived both the ravages of time and countless battles, surviving until the present day.
This "Mountain King," who once joined forces with the great heroes against the Black Tide, holds a special place in the hearts of the Scions of the Canopy. Some tribe members believe that it has its current body shape because it has a unique physique, like the Qucusaurus "Tyrant"... Though in fact, this is simply because it's lived for so long, and eaten way, WAY too much.

customize.text: Once Kongamato saved Burkina from falling from a big height and became his loyal companion since then. During the

customize.name: Khaenri'ahn cataclysm
customize.desc: A disaster that occurred 500 years ago. The Abyss was released into Teyvat and Khaenri'ah was destroyed.

customize.text: they fought the Abyss together but the Yumkasaurus became corrupted and killed Burkina. In his final moments, Burkina made the fateful decision to not fight back, and instead pass his blood and power onto the Mountain King.

customize.name: Tenoch
customize.desc: A hero of Natlan, who lived 500 years ago. He didn't belong to any tribe, because he was exiled. During the Cataclysm, he united the six tribes and went to the western islands to fight a giant black monster.

customize.text:
Burkina joined Tenoch to fight the Abyss.
Yupanqui
The predecessor of the Ancient Name Malipo, who lived about 1,000 years ago.

customize.name: Kinich
customize.desc: A Huitztlan Saurian Hunter skilled at counting costs.

customize.text: One of the six heroes of Natlan and the current bearer of the Ancient Name Malipo.

customize.name: Fruitful Hook
customize.desc: Bold Burkina from the Scions of the Canopy once made this weapon with the hero Tenoch's help â€” all for the sake of obtaining Flamegranates unmatched throughout Natlan.

customize.name: Talking Stick
customize.desc: Most people will find this obsidian-inlaid club quite convincing indeed.
